Sentencas: Nickel-doped lanthanum cobalt oxide (LaCo1-xNixO3-delta, LCN) was investigated as an alternative anode material for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Characteristics of LaCo1-xNixO3-δ Coated on Ni/YSZ Anode using CH4 Fuel in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: To improve its catalytic activity for steam methane reforming (SMR) reaction, Ni2+ was substituted into Co3+ lattice in LaCoO3.
Titulo: Characteristics of LaCo1-xNixO3-δ Coated on Ni/YSZ Anode using CH4 Fuel in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: LCN anode, synthesized using the Pechini method, reacts with yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte at high temperatures to form an electrochemically inactive phase such as La2Zr2O7.
Titulo: Characteristics of LaCo1-xNixO3-δ Coated on Ni/YSZ Anode using CH4 Fuel in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: To minimize the interlayer by-products, the LCN was coated via a double-tape casting method on the Ni/YSZ anode as a catalytic functional layer.
Titulo: Characteristics of LaCo1-xNixO3-δ Coated on Ni/YSZ Anode using CH4 Fuel in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: By increasing the Ni doping amount, oxygen vacancies in the LCN increased and the cell performance improved.
Titulo: Characteristics of LaCo1-xNixO3-δ Coated on Ni/YSZ Anode using CH4 Fuel in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: CH4 fuel decomposed to H-2 and CO via SMR reaction in the LCN functional layer.
Titulo: Characteristics of LaCo1-xNixO3-δ Coated on Ni/YSZ Anode using CH4 Fuel in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Hence, the LCN-coated Ni/YSZ anode exhibited better cell performance than the Ni/YSZ anode under H-2 and CH4 fuels.
Titulo: Characteristics of LaCo1-xNixO3-δ Coated on Ni/YSZ Anode using CH4 Fuel in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: LCN with 12 mol% of Ni (LCN12)-modified Ni/YSZ anode showed excellent long-term stability under H-2 and CH4 conditions.
Titulo: Characteristics of LaCo1-xNixO3-δ Coated on Ni/YSZ Anode using CH4 Fuel in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
